title: What are the best Facebook alternatives in 2023?
description: There are other social platforms out there for every type of user.

title: Google’s next-gen AR glasses join the Google graveyard
description: Google is now focusing on Android XR software for headsets and "micro XR" for AR glasses.

title: Google’s Nearby Share can now send files to your sleeping devices
description: If you use Nearby Share to send something to a sleeping device, it will wake right up.

title: We loved this Roborock vacuum at $649, so it’s a steal at $399.99
description: We gave the Roborock S7 robot vacuum a rave review, and it's now $250 off at an all-time low price.

title: Telegram announces it’s launching Stories next month
description: Telegram states that the feature will arrive in early July.

title: The new Sony HT-S2000 soundbar just got its first price drop
description: The feature-pacaked soundbar is $52 off in this Amazon deal.

title: Galaxy Buds 3 may be a no show at Samsung’s July Unpacked event
description: The leak suggests the Samsung's foldables and tablet will likely be there, however.

title: Google supports you fixing your Pixel Fold yourself, a first for any foldable
description: We have some good news for DIY enthusiasts who might be nervous about investing in a Google Pixel Fold.

title: Tired of adding ‘reddit’ to your web search? Google says this feature will help
description: Google announced Perspectives at I/O, but the search feature is rolling out this week.

title: Spot the difference: Google reveals a new Android logo and wordmark
description: The flat Bugdroid logo gets replaced with a 3D avatar, while the wordmark gets a new font and sentence case.

title: The overclocked Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 is coming to more phones
description: The REDMAGIC 8S Pro will be the first non-Samsung phone with the overclocked Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip.

title: Nothing reveals Glyph Ringtones: Custom ringtones with Glyph lighting
description: Yes, the feature will come to both the Nothing Phone 1 and Phone 2.
